title: Is California Governor Jerry Brown Vito the Forest Fire Management Bill, increasing the risk of forest fires?
subtitle: A conservative political website established a link between the rejection by the Democratic Party of a legislative proposal in 2016 and the prevalence and risks of forest fires in the following two years.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Jerry Brown vetoed the Forest Fire Management Bill in 2016, which contributed to the spread and risk of forest fires in the following two years.
